x x x x x x x mīnu x x x x x x x Ruʾuaya x x x x x x x-bu-bu ūmâ annurig ina muhhi x x x x x x x-lik-a-ni x x x x x x x mār šipri x x x x x x x mā ašappar x x x x Marduk-apla-iddina x x x x x x x-a amattah x x x x x x x niqṭirib x x x x x x x iqṭibia ūmâ annurig ana šarri bēlīya assapra šarru bēlī kî ša ilaʾʾûni lēpuš issurri šarru bēlī iqabbi mā šar Elamti ayāka šû x x x x x x x x uttammiš x x x x x x x x ittalak
